clientID.description: ID of the GitHub OAuth app

clientSecret.description: Secret used by the GitHub OAuth app

sessionCollection.description: Name of the database collection used to store user session data

sessionSameSite.description: Asserts that a cookie must not be sent with cross-origin requests

sessionSecret.description: A secret used to encode/decode user sessions

sessionSecure.description: If true, cookie is only sent to the server when a request is made with the https scheme

sessionLifespan.description: How long a session should remain valid for in milliseconds
